The Criminal's thread is a quest item that is found at the murder scene during the Murder Mystery quest. It is used again during King's Ransom. It is used to help identify the murderer in the Murder Mystery Quest.

Note: the colour of the thread is different for each person who does Murder Mystery. It can either be red, green, or blue.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
4 October 2005 –
7 February 2006

The items were renamed from "Criminals' thread"[sic] to "Criminal's thread".

28 February -
18 April 2005

The items' inventory sprites were slightly adjusted.
